H0.text: The testes are the part of the male reproductive system involved with the most common disorders.

H1.text: The ureter is the part of the male reproductive system that is involved with the most common disorders.

H2.text: The penis is the part of the male reproductive system that is involved with the most common disorders.

H3.text: The glans is the part of the male reproductive system involved with the most common disorders.

A4.text: Regular testicular self-examination is recommended to improve the chances of identifying cases of testicular cancer, neoplasms, and other health issues early.

A5.text: Varicocele, swollen vein(s) from the testes, usually affecting the left side, the testis usually being normal.
